author: newsr.in
title: Destroy Windows 10 Spying Updated with Anti-Office 2016 Telemetry Features
text: There are many ways to protect your privacy after upgrading to Windows 10 and tech-savvy users can do this all manually by editing the HOSTS file and disabling background processes, but there are plenty of third-party apps out there that can do everything manually. Destroy Windows 10 Spying is one of these apps and it comes with an almost perfect mix of easy-to-use interface and powerful features, so it’s no surprise that so many people are interested in the updates its dev... »
